ne18:2.1: Yo dhammo yam dhammam janayati, tassa so parikkharo.
ne18:2.4: Dve dhamma janayanti hetu ca paccayo ca.
ne18:2.8: Yatha ankurassa nibbattiya bijam asadharanam, pathavi apo ca sadharana.
ne18:2.9: Ankurassa hi pathavi apo ca paccayo sabhavo hetu.
ne18:2.10: Yatha va pana ghate duddham pakkhittam dadhi bhavati, na catthi ekakalasamavadhanam duddhassa ca dadhissa ca.
ne18:2.11: Evamevam natthi ekakalasamavadhanam hetussa ca paccayassa ca.
ne18:3.2: Vuttam hi avijjapaccaya sankhara, sankharapaccaya vinnanam, evam sabbo paticcasamuppado.
ne18:3.3: Iti avijja avijjaya hetu ayoniso manasikaro paccayo.
ne18:3.5: Tattha purimika avijja avijjanusayo pacchimika avijja avijjapariyutthanam, purimiko avijjanusayo pacchimikassa avijjapariyutthanassa hetubhuto paribruhanaya, bijankuro viya samanantarahetutaya.
ne18:3.6: Yam pana yattha phalam nibbattati, idamassa paramparahetutaya hetubhutam.
ne18:3.7: Duvidho hi hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca, evam avijjayapi duvidho hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca.
ne18:4.1: Yatha va pana thalakanca vatti ca telanca padipassa paccayabhutam na sabhavahetu, na hi sakka thalakanca vattinca telanca anaggikam dipetum padipassa paccayabhutam.
ne18:5.1: Avupacchedattho santati attho, nibbatti attho phalattho, patisandhi attho punabbhavattho, palibodhattho pariyutthanattho, asamugghatattho anusayattho, asampativedhattho avijjattho, aparinnatattho vinnanassa bijattho.
ne18:5.2: Yattha avupacchedo tattha santati, yattha santati tattha nibbatti, yattha nibbatti tattha phalam, yattha phalam tattha patisandhi, yattha patisandhi tattha punabbhavo, yattha punabbhavo tattha palibodho, yattha palibodho tattha pariyutthanam, yattha pariyutthanam tattha asamugghato.
ne18:5.3: Yattha asamugghato tattha anusayo, yattha anusayo tattha asampativedho, yattha asampativedho tattha avijja, yattha avijja tattha sasavam vinnanam aparinnatam, yattha sasavam vinnanam aparinnatam tattha bijattho.
ne18:6.1: Silakkhandho samadhikkhandhassa paccayo, samadhikkhandho pannakkhandhassa paccayo, pannakkhandho vimuttikkhandhassa paccayo, vimuttikkhandho vimuttinanadassanakkhandhassa paccayo.
ne18:6.2: Titthannuta pitannutaya paccayo, pitannuta pattannutaya paccayo, pattannuta attannutaya paccayo.
ne18:7.1: Yatha va pana cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam.
ne18:7.2: Tattha cakkhu adhipateyyapaccayataya paccayo, rupa arammanapaccayataya paccayo.
ne18:7.3: Aloko sannissayataya paccayo, manasikaro sabhavo hetu.
ne18:7.19: Evam yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkharo.
ne18:7.20: Tenaha ayasma mahakaccayano “ye dhamma yam dhammam janayanti”ti.
